name: Azure Security Center email notification for subscription owner is not set
description: This policy identifies the Azure Security Center in which email notification for subscription owner is not set. Enabling this will enable Microsoft to send security alert emails to subscription owners. This will make sure that you are aware of any security issues and can take prompt actions to mitigate the risks.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'azure' AND api.name = 'azure-security-center-settings' AND json.rule = 'securityContacts is empty or securityContacts[*].properties.email is empty or securityContacts[*].properties.alertsToAdmins equals Off'
recommendation:
1. Log in to the Azure portal
2. Go to 'Security Center'
3. Click on 'Pricing & Settings'
4. Click on the Subscription
5. Click on 'Email Notifications'
6. In Section 'Email recipients', from the drop down of field 'All users with the following roles' select 'Owner'
7. Click on 'Save'
